about_the_game:
Trapped in a nightmarish world, you awaken to find yourself at the mercy of a sinister Game Master. "Labyrinth - Roll of Fate" is a first-person, turn-based horror roguelike inspired by classic board games. Your only hope of freedom lies in playing the Game Master’s twisted game and surviving his malevolent challenge.

"How will you escape?"

Each turn, the dice decide your fate. Roll to determine the number of actions you can take, whether it’s moving, utilizing cards or the unfortunate turn skip. Beware, for every move could bring you closer to freedom or doom, and the Game Master ensures no two games are ever the same.



Throughout your journey, discover cards with the power to aid your escape. Use them wisely to gain advantages, such as additional extra actions, a compass, or a decoy to distract the Game Master from reaching you. But be cautious—each card carries an element of chance, and luck might not always be on your side.



With its chilling atmosphere, strategic gameplay, and changing map on every playthrough, "Labyrinth - Roll of Fate" offers a unique blend of horror and strategy. Can you outwit the Game Master and reclaim your freedom, or will you be trapped in his eerie domain forever?

Key Features

  • Turn-based gameplay with dice rolls determining actions
  • Dynamic challenges and an unpredictable Game Master
  • Immersive horror atmosphere with high re-playability
  • Achievement's to unlock dice customization options

name: Labyrinth - Roll of Fate

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Relatively modern dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Relatively modern dedicated graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Trapped by a sinister Game Master, your only hope of escape is to play his twisted game. Blending first-person horror with turn-based strategy and inspired by classic board games, each turn, you roll the dice to determine your fate. But beware, the Game Master ensures no two games are ever the same.
